greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix inverse of triangle A111544.
comment: The column sequences are all equal after the initial terms and are derived from the logarithm of a factorial series (cf. A111546).
formula: T(n, n)=1 and T(n+1, n)=-n-1, else T(n+k+1, k) = -A111546(k) for k>=1.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 07 2005
